index: Eleventy VF 13 + 20 This allows using 11ty static site generator with direct access Visual Framework code Quickstart yarn init @visual framework/vf eleventy your new site name ebi eleventy boilerplate will install new ebi eleventy boilerplate folder named Then follow onscreen prompts links below develop configure Longer install above too easy have questions Read this guide What get component system Component installation add can use npm/Yarn manually either case 'll need re run gulp dev ensure fully loaded installation: @visual framework/vf logo updating: upgrade interactive latest Manual customisation Download pattern Copy /src/components/vf component name Add your own local custom VF compatible /src/components your site vf component 'll find vf sample there 've used below: Code: {% render "@vf sample" {text: "with some text"} %} Returns: 'm sample text
